abstract: Firebrand, a television and online service that since October has been presenting commercials as content, is being shut down as its major investors decided to stop providing more money.
snippet: Firebrand, a television and online service that since October has been presenting commercials as content, is being shut down as its major investors decided to stop providing more money.
lead_paragraph: Update: Thursday, 2:20 p.m.: A spokesman for Ion Television said on Thursday that the last Firebrand TV show will be broadcast on Friday night.
